PERSONAL DETAILS



NAME			:	Roberto Andreucetti.

ADDRESS		:	**********************
				Clontarf
				Dublin 3.

TELEPHONE		:	******************

EMAIL			:	robertoandreucetti@gmail.com

DATE OF BIRTH	:	23.12.1988


	
EDUCATION


Sept 10’ – June 13’     Bachelor Degree of Science in Information Technology, 
College of Computer Training (CCT), 30-34 Westmoreland
St. Dublin 2.
Certification: In the process of obtaining certificate.

Feb 10’ – Feb 11’	College of Computer Training (CCT), 30-34 Westmoreland
St. Dublin 2, FETAC Level 5 Certificate in Information Technology. 
Certification: FETAC Level 5 Certificate in Information Technology

July 09’ – Aug 09’       FAS Introduction Course to Web Design.

Oct 08’ – Feb 09’	FAS Introduction to Electronics and Computing.
			Certification: FETAC Level 4 Certification in Electronics and 
			Computing.

2001 - 2007		Mount Temple Comprehensive School, Malahide Road, Dublin 3.
			Junior Certificate and Leaving Certificate obtained.	


WORK EXPERIENCE




July 12’ - 		Clean & Fix Solutions, Kilmore, Co.Wexford.
			Position: Part-time cleaning/ repair staff. – 

Duties: Using industrial standard equipment to clean and service carpet & upholstery, along with painting and general maintenance. Working to deadlines as part of a team.

Feb 09’ – Feb 10’	The Inevitable Salvage Company, Co.Wexford.
			Position: Office Clerk/Temporary work experience placement one 
			day per week.

Duties: Monitoring telephone/email, daily management of computerised accounts (sage), filing, photocopying and liaising with customers. 	


June 08’ – Sep 08’	Mary Barry’s, Kilmore, Co.Wexford.
			Position: Waiter/kitchen staff. 

Duties: Interacting with customers, workinging within a team to deliver food and drink ordered from customers, cleaning tables and kitchen to a high hygienic standard.

Dec 07’ – Jan 08’       	Dunnes Stores, Redmond Square, Wexford.
			Position Held: Seasonal warehouse and floor staff.
			
Duties: Working within a team, interacting with customers,  managing stock take & cleaning to and industrial hygienic standard.
 
May 06' - July 06'	Supervalu Raheny, Dublin 5.
			Position Held: Part-time floor staff. 

Duties: Working within a team, interacting with customers,  managing stock take & cleaning to and industrial hygienic standard.










INTERESTS:

Wide range of 
•	Music
•	Computer science
•	Movies
•	Sport
•	Reading                                .
